response.overview: A building with fifty years of history was once a popular spot in the memory of the locals, but now it is considered to be the  cancer of the city because of its shabby exterior and the interior that looks like a ruin. When it was going to be rebuilt due to  urban renewal, "Escape Plan," a group of young graffiti artists, sneaked in this twelve-story ruined building. For them, it is a  rarely seen wonderful space to create art. They are now planning to challenge themselves to create something they have never  thought of.
response.title: Starlight in the Ruin

release_dates.note: Chiayi International Art Doc Film Festival
